attributes.action: How to pass horse and riders advert
attributes.additional_details:
These are the figures reported to the BHS in 2014

H= Horse R= Rider

5 Fatal (H) 4 Fatal (R)

11 Severe (H) 12 Severe(R)

16 Moderate (H) 27 Moderate (R)

45 Mild (H) 37 Mild (R)

191 None 188 None
attributes.background: I am campagining for an advert on televison and all media for awnesses on how to pass horses on the road. In the UK there are between 600,000 - 2.1 Million horses so why does no one know how to pass us!
